Detailed Description

The main panel after the user logs into the application.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum MainPanel::ControlIdentifiers [private]

Control identifiers.

Enumerator:
ID_EDIT  The editbox.
ID_CONTENT  The FeedPanel listbox.
ID_TINYURL  Link button.
ID_TWITPIC  Twitpic image upload button.
ID_COUNTER  Character counter.
ID_PUBLIC  View public feeds button.
ID_FRIEND  View friend feeds button.
ID_FILTER_AT  Filter by replies button.

Here is the call graph for this function:

void MainPanel::OnDropFiles ( wxDropFilesEvent &  evt  ) 

Handles image files being dropped on the main window and shows the ImagePreviewDialog for image uploading.

Precondition:
the file dropped on the window is a valid image file

Here is the call graph for this function:

void MainPanel::OnEditEnter ( wxCommandEvent &  evt  ) 

Handles the enter key being pressed in the editbox, sending the existing editbox text to Twitter::UpdateStatus and clearing the contents.

void MainPanel::OnEditText ( wxCommandEvent &  evt  ) 

Handles typing in the editbox, updates the character counter to show how many characters have been typed.

Twitter has a 140 character limit on its messages, so this is important for usability.

Here is the call graph for this function:

void MainPanel::OnImageClick ( wxCommandEvent &  evt  ) 

Handles the clicking of the image upload button and shows the ImagePreviewDialog.

Postcondition:
If the image is uploaded successfully, the URL to the image is appended (or inserted) to the editbox.

Here is the call graph for this function:

void MainPanel::OnShortenUrl ( wxCommandEvent &  evt  ) 

Handles the shorten URL button click (or Ctrl+L accelerator).

If no text is selected in the editbox or if the text is not a valid URL, an input dialog will be shown to request the URL to shorten, otherwise the selected text is used as the URL.

Here is the call graph for this function:

void MainPanel::SetAccelerators (  )  [private]

Sets up all the keyboard accelerators (Ctrl+L for link shortening).

void MainPanel::SetPanelOrder (  )  [private]

Orders panel controls by user settings (editbox on top / editbox on bottom).

void MainPanel::ShortenUrl ( wxString &  shortUrl  )  [protected]

Shortens a URL (thread callback) and replaces the string shortUrl with the shortened URL.

Warning:
this code runs from another thread and should not attempt to directly manipulate the GUI.
Parameters:
shortUrl the URL to be shortened. This will be replaced on return with the shortened URL, or the empty string if an error occurred.
